SEARCH
Package gw.api.database

Class StandardQueryBeanResultWithSummary<T extends Bean>

java.lang.Object
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.QueryProcessorBase<T>

gw.api.database.QueryBeanResultWithSummary<T,QueryRow>
gw.api.database.StandardQueryBeanResultWithSummary<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryBeanResultInternal<T>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.impl.IQueryResultInternal<T,T>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<T,QueryRow>, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IWrappedQueryResult<T,T>, IQueryBeanResult<T>, IQueryResult<T,T>, IQueryResultSet<T>, Serializable, Iterable<T>
public class StandardQueryBeanResultWithSummary<T extends Bean> extends QueryBeanResultWithSummary<T,QueryRow>
Wraps a IQueryBeanResult containing search results together with and a IQueryBeanResult that produces the summary query row for those results. The constructor is parameterized with both the main processor and the summary processor; all of the methods defined by the IQueryBeanResult interface are implemented by delegating to the main processor passed to the constructor.
Author:
Allan Heydon

  • Method Details

    • allowMultipleSummaryRows

      public boolean allowMultipleSummaryRows()
      Description copied from class: QueryBeanResultWithSummary
      Indicates whether or not multiple summary rows should be allowed. Currently the only use case for this is multi-currency, when a SUM is done on an amount column and the Currency is also selected, resulting in a GROUP BY on the Currency. If this method returns true, multiple summary rows will call the sum to be nulled out; otherwise, multiple summary rows will result in an exception.
      Specified by:
      allowMultipleSummaryRows in interface com.guidewire.pl.system.database.IQueryBeanResultWithSummary<T extends Bean,QueryRow>
      Overrides:
      allowMultipleSummaryRows in class QueryBeanResultWithSummary<T extends Bean,QueryRow>
      Returns:
      true if multiple summary rows are allowed, false if not
